mapper.select: select res.resimg resimg, res.resname resname, res.resnation resnation, res.resadress resadress, res.resstate resstate, res.resgrade resgrade, res.reshour reshour, res.reshourend reshourend, res.restype restype from member_favorite as memf join restaurant_table as res on res.resno = memf.resno where memf.userid = #{userid} order by memf.no desc
